mods.note: No. 417 (57/62/38) BRITISH M : .V :3Y, WARSAW 14th ecembor, 1938 >i ' ■ 1 i i ’ I ■ | My Lord, I have the honour to report that it is officially announced that the Polish Government have appointed Monsieur Jan Karsao-Biedlewaki , formerly Polish Consul at Kiev, to he nvoy extraordinary and Minister Plenipotentiary to the Governments of Iran, Iraq and Afghanistan, with residence at Tehran, Monsieur Karszo-Siedlewski 9 s predecessor, Monsieur Stanialaw Hemnel, was Minister to Iran and Iraq only, with supervision over the Polish Consulate at Kabul, established in ‘ebrusry last, whose oresent incumbent is Monsieur Miehal lomsszewlcz. S* I am sending copies of this despatch to His Majesty’s Representatives at Bagdad, Tehran and Kabul. I have the honour to be, with the highest respect. My lord. Your Lordahio’s most obedient, humble Servant, (Sd) H.W.K3MARD The ight Honourable The Viscount Halifax, P.G., 0.0.P.1,, etc. etc etc

location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: PZ 166/1939 'Polish representation in Persia, Iraq and Afghanistan'

physicalDescription.extent: This file consists of a single item.

Foliation: the foliation sequence for this description commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at inside back cover with 4; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: The file contains a letter which was forwarded from the Under Secretary of State for Foreign Affairs to the Under Secretary of State for India in January 1939. The forwarded letter is dated 14 December 1938 and was sent by Howard William Kennard, HM Ambassador of the United Kingdom to Poland, to the Viscount Halifax, Secretary of State for Foreign and Commonwealth Affairs. The letter reports the appointment of a Polish Envoy Extraordinary and Minister Plenipotentiary to Iran, Iraq and Afghanistan, with residence at Tehran.

name.namePart: Secretary of State for Foreign Affairs
Polish Envoy Extraordinary and Minister Plenipotentiary to Iran, Iraq and Afghanistan
